ygData.subject: bummin
ygData.msgSnippet: A couple of nights ago I left the e-brake on my car. The next morning it was frozen in place. Well, I had to get to school on time so I drove, hoping it would
ygData.messageBody:
A couple of nights ago I left the e-brake on my
car. The next morning it was frozen in place. Well, I
had to get to school on time so I drove, hoping it
would thaw out quickly. Well, it didn't. Now my
transmission is messed up and I have to get it fixed. I'm a
little short on cash, so I really need to sell my lvl 47
cleric on Povar. I havn't played him in about 2 months.
He is kunark enabled, but not velious. He has about
180 wis w/ just decent items, 200 wis is very
obtainable. Some of his items include donals vambraces, totem
of warrior spirit. He is not very well known with a
great reputation, even before I stopped playing. I was
getting him ready to apply for one of the best guilds on
Povar, but I moved and never had a chance to follow
through. I kinda feel like a bum askin, but if anyone is
interested, at all, pls email me at: stugger@.... Im
not looking for big bucks, $150 would be plenty
enough, as I need cash decently quick. If I keep driving
on my tranny like this, its going to be poop when
summer comes around.<br><br>thanks alot<br>bob d
